name: Attractive Defence
description:
not mobile friendly 

controls:

wsad for camera movement, qe for zooming

use the mouse to buy upgrade and repair buildings 

Only you can save the space from falling appart! 

The goal is to get a smany points as possible in this survival game. Enemy ships try to destroy your crystal, which makes you lose automatically. The playfield can be expanded by placing magnets. That allow for greater reach. More magnets means more attraction. The enemies become stronger with every magnet you place. 

Money is gained by clearing out waves, killing enemies and per second based on which wave you are in. You get extra money for every magnet you place (more risk)

Dont forget to upgrade the turrets, as well as research new ones!

Base specials
From level 3 onwards they create an auto deployed shield, helps a lot

Building specials
magnets increase cash inflow, research lab is expensive but allows you to research faster repair speed, more money, and new turrets.
